reviews.review: I usually hesitate to give a film five stars, particularly a Marvel film - because I don't want my love for the films as a fan to obscure my critical perspective - but the Russos really nail this one. Infinity War is bold, juggles more characters than you can comprehend gracefully and thoughtfully, packs a gut-punch or jaw-drop scene by scene, remains humourous and desperately emotional. As a fan, perhaps the best and maybe even only way to experience the film properly, Infinity War delivers. It's shocking, it's brutal and it thoroughly culminates ten glorious years of comic book lovers' dreams on screen. Cannot wait to see what on Earth (or in fact not) happens next. Fantastic.
Not good....Not good at all. About three times I had to tell myself, you paid for this movie don't walk out. I would say wait for this on DVD. I can only hope the sequel will be better then this.

If you have been a fan of the MCU for the last ten years then you must see this movie. It is totally worth it and sets up our classic and favorite Avengers united for a spectacular finish. Keep away from the negative reviews and experience this for yourself. 

Better than Last Jedi. Though that's not saying much. My morning coffee is better than that dumpster fire of a movie.
Not a perfect one but its one of best movies I've ever watched. Thanos lived up to the hype created about him.
WOW all I can say is WOW I can't wait to see it again
Good entertainment but Too long, some scenes seem over done
with one caviot if you have not seen any of the other films. it could be confusing. if not the film is a wonderful time with a great ending

This film manages to bring together all characters in a very solid story whilst living up to the hype. Every cast played so well, it defaintly feels like a Thanos origin story. Thanos proves why he is the most fearsum villain there is and by the end of the movie you almost have some empathy for him. Easily the best villain there is. great movie, lots of fun, fantastic funny moments between members, insane fight scenes, defaintly not to miss.

Watched it & going to watch it again tomorrow. 
Excellent job done by Russo brothers. Thoanos raised the bar.
He is not like an evil dumb .. His motivations takes him in another league..
Just want to say .. The end is here..
